clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Administered intravenously biricodar dicitrate is to be used in combination with cancer chemotherapy agents

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Biricodar dicitrate blocks two major multi drug resistance mechanisms P glycoprotein MDR 1 and multi drug resistance associated protein MRP

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Afatinib can be increased when it is combined with Biricodar
The serum concentration of Bosutinib can be increased when it is combined with Biricodar
